meta.title: Vert.x 3 Web easy as Pi
meta.summary: Vert.x Web distinguishes itself from traditional application servers like JavaEE by just being a simple extension toolkit to Vert.x, which makes it quite lightweight and small but nevertheless very powerful.

meta.title: Vert.x 2.1.6 released!
meta.summary: The Vert.x team is pleased to announce the release of Vert.x 2.1.6
